results.title: At the spare time
results.creator_credit: Film Studio of the Peoples Republic of China
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “China Today”.
Focuses on the many leisure activities of Chinese workers and professionals. Cultural and artistic pursuits are an important part of the workers’ lifestyle.

results.title: Flower buds
results.creator_credit: Central Newsreel and Documentary Film Studio of the People's Republic of China
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “China Today”.
This film covers cultural aspects of children’s lives in China such as dance, children’s orchestra, singing, folk-dance, traditional music and instruments. Non-stylised overview of traditional cultural traditions as demonstrated by children.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Central Newsreel and Documentary Film Studio of the People’s Republic of China

results.title: Assembly tools
results.brief_description: Features the methods for mounting various types of components and demonstrates different methods of attaching leads through the board. Shows correct orientation of components and suggestions for handling sensitive components.
results.description: Features the methods for mounting various types of components and demonstrates different methods of attaching leads through the board. Shows correct orientation of components and suggestions for handling sensitive components.
description_for_label: Features the methods for mounting various types of components and demonstrates different methods of attaching leads through the board. Shows correct orientation of components and suggestions for handling sensitive components.
results.media_note: Sorry, we don't have images or video for this item.

results.title: Asian artists in crystals
results.brief_description: Describes an exhibit of American crystalware engraved with designs created by sixteen artists representing Burma, Ceylon, China, Egypt, India, Indonesia, Iran, Iraq, Japan, Korea, Pakistan, the Philippines, Syria, Thailand, Turkey, and Vietnam. Shows the work of these artists, how American designers captured the mood of the drawings in crystal form, and how American craftsmen translated the drawings into engravings.
results.description: Describes an exhibit of American crystalware engraved with designs created by sixteen artists representing Burma, Ceylon, China, Egypt, India, Indonesia, Iran, Iraq, Japan, Korea, Pakistan, the Philippines, Syria, Thailand, Turkey, and Vietnam. Shows the work of these artists, how American designers captured the mood of the drawings in crystal form, and how American craftsmen translated the drawings into engravings.
description_for_label: Describes an exhibit of American crystalware engraved with designs created by sixteen artists representing Burma, Ceylon, China, Egypt, India, Indonesia, Iran, Iraq, Japan, Korea, Pakistan, the Philippines, Syria, Thailand, Turkey, and Vietnam. Shows the work of these artists, how American designers captured the mood of the drawings in crystal form, and how American craftsmen translated the drawings into engravings.

results.title: Ash Wednesday
results.brief_description: Documents the restoration of essential electricity supply to fire damaged areas of Victoria after the bushfires of Ash Wednesday, 1983. Shows the work done by the SEC crews and the conditions with which they had to cope.
results.description: Documents the restoration of essential electricity supply to fire damaged areas of Victoria after the bushfires of Ash Wednesday, 1983. Shows the work done by the SEC crews and the conditions with which they had to cope.
